Explanation:

In the original post, the person attributes their feelings of being a prisoner in their own life to their own actions or decisions (internal attributional style). In the transferred post, the person attributes their situation to external factors such as being forced to put on a fake smile for a photo shoot (external attributional style). The language used in the post has also been changed to reflect an external attributional style, focusing on the impact of external factors rather than internal factors.
